title: Massacre - Killing Time (Celluloid Cd) (FLAC)
description:
IMPORTANT : NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH A DEATH METAL BAND UNDER THE SAME NAME !!!!

Massacre was an improvising and experimental  band from New York City, formed in 1980 by guitarist Fred Frith, bassist Bill Laswell and drummer Fred Maher. They performed live for just over a year and recorded a studio album, Killing Time. Frith and Laswell reformed Massacre in 1998 with drummer Charles Hayward and released a couple of albums on John Zorn's TZADIK label.
